channel.title: Adding global(?) objects to region clipping? [PI]
channel.description:
Well, I recently added region clipping to my server, including a new clipped firemaking. Everything is working perfectly. Just 1 minor issue. I have objects loaded via ObjectManager.java (not the one from the tutorial I followed). They aren't included to the clipping method, meaning a player can still no-clip through some objects.
Here's the tut I followed: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=527173.0 I don't think the firemaking one is needed here, but yeah.

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well, I recently added region clipping to my server, including a new clipped firemaking.
Everything is working perfectly. Just 1 minor issue. I have objects loaded via ObjectManager.java (not the one from the tutorial I followed). They aren’t included to the clipping method, meaning a player can still no-clip through some objects.

Here’s the tut I followed: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=527173.0
I don’t think the firemaking one is needed here, but yeah.
